body:
Comment 1: 
This is unfortunately the only thing in go-mode that does not work in GNU Emacs 23:
Treating `` as raw strings.

If you upgrade to GNU Emacs 24, the issue will be resolved.

Fixing this in GNU Emacs 23 would require rewriting most of Emacs's parsing facilities
(as has once been done and proved to be unreliable and unmaintainable.)
